TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_tatipeluk_a_kalisiw, title = tatipeluk_a_kalisiw, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/tatipeluk_a_kalisiw} }

S.FORM: Tatipeluk a kalisiw atu Pida (kamu nu Hulam: ) i ayaw nu cami a kalisiw, u katinengan nu katuuday sa u tatipeluk a kalisiw, u tatipeluk adada', nika kapah sapicakay tu kakaan, kazizeng, kapah sipicakay tu luma' kya palatatenga' ku katuuday tu mahiniay maingsace tu sulit a tatipeluk saw? sayaway, u tuud ku sapibalic nu tatademaw, patinaku, izaw ku palumaay tu paza' u biyaw paluma tu padingad , mababalic kuhini tu nipaluma, hangay yadah ku nikanan a tuud. nika caay kacaluway mahini, patinaku, izaw yadah ku nipaluma tu paza', maydih ciniza a mibalic tu takal atu mukung, nika caay kaydih ku mukung a yadah ku paza', u salusalus ku kaydihan niza, mahini caay kababalic kuhini tu tuud. kyu, u kuki atu kim u ging ku sapicakay nu katuuday, u sayaway a kalisiw. u kim atu ging u caay kayadah a tuud, caay kalawpes ku puc, kyu kapah a mala kalisiw. nika anu izaw ku tayzaay i batad milyuku, maydih micakay tu matekesay a luma' sa a miculu tu yadahay a kim caay kacaluway. kyu u kakanatal mipatizeng tu tu tatipeluk atu kim sanuhini hantu a kalisiw. hangay palatatenga' ku katuuday u nipiing nu sebu a tatipeluk a kalisiw caay kalawpes, yu subabad miing ku sebu tu tatipeluk a kalisiw, a misuped aca tu kim, a musakamu aca ku sebu tu binawlan, anu yaanyaan kapah henay mibaclic tu kim. saan. i 1971 a mihcaan, u cungtung nu Amilika ci Nikesun mihapuy, miing tu meycaw sapica misuped tu kim sa, katuuday daecus tu u meycaw mibalic tu kim, mahiniay a kawaw caay kalawpes ku katuuday tu nipiing nu sebu tu tatipeluk a kalisiw, anu palatatenga' tu binawlan tu sebu, mahiniay a kalisiw kapah henay sapicakay tu cacanan a tuud. palatatenga' tu sebu ku binawlan, palatatenga' tu kakugingku. sawsawni u singyyonka ku alaen mahiniay u singyonka u nu suka a kalisiw han. kapah mala kalisiw a micukaymas zaysa palatatenga' ku binawlan tu nipikeysan nu gingku .
